                    java.lang.String item)

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem​(java.lang.String item)
        check whether an item is in player's pocket
        参数:
        item - wanted item name
        返回:
        true/false

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem​(java.lang.String item)
